title: Secret Lives of the Super Rich – Home | CNBC Prime
text:
Season 5 Episode 501 Aired 03-30-2016 › More Secret Lives of the Super Rich About Secret Lives of the Super Rich brings viewers face-to-face with some of the wealthiest people on the planet, revealing their voracious appetite for the best of the best and the secret to their extraordinary success. Robert Frank 
Robert Frank is an award-winning journalist, best-selling author and a leading authority on the American wealthy. He joined CNBC in May 2012 as a reporter and editor and is host of "Secret Lives of the Super Rich."
